name: Walter Michelin
tagline: Computer Science at The College of New Jersey
body:
Walter Michelin

(732) 597-0253

wmichelin@gmail.com 	
     
michelw2@tcnj.edu



**Education**

Ocean County College, Toms River, New Jersey
Associate of Science in Business Administration May 2013
Cum Laude 
     Dean’s List for two semesters

The College of New Jersey, Ewing, New Jersey
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science December 2015
Transferred to TCNJ in Fall 2013

**Computer Science Experience**

CSC 230: Data Structures: The College of New Jersey, 
August 2013 – December 2013

•	Created and implemented various Java and C++ programs under the supervision of Dr. Peter DePasquale.
•	Heavy use of key fundamental object oriented programming concepts that can carry over to any object oriented programming language. 

CSC 415: Software Engineering: The College of New Jersey, 
January 2014- May 2014

•	This course introduces students to software engineering with an emphasis on collaborative problem solving and software application development Advanced object-oriented and implementation concepts are introduced through the C++ programming language.

**Technical Proficiencies**

Languages:  C++ (5 Years), Java (4 Years), Python (1 Year)

Database Software: Microsoft Access

Other Software: Microsoft Excel, Word, PowerPoint

Operating Systems: Linux, Mac OSX, Windows

Other:  Experience creating custom PCs

**Leadership**

Toms River Youth Lacrosse
•	Referee
•	Volunteer

Toms River High School south Theatre
•	Senior Cast Member
•	Fundraising and recruiting

**Other Experience**

  Bookkeeper, Saker ShopRites Incorporated, Toms River, NJ,
 August 2011- August 2013

•	Promoted from Cashier within one month of employment
•	Managed storewide cash inflow
•	Coordinated reconciliation of store register accounts

  General Maintenance Associate, TAB Construction Company, Pine Beach, NJ, 
May 2009-August 2013

•	General maintenance position
•	Required timely and professional completion of individual jobs for various clients
